protocol_name: Extraction of DNA from 2 ml blood samples using Flexigene Kit (QIAGEN)
protocol_name_html: Extraction of DNA from 2 ml blood samples using Flexigene Kit (QIAGEN)
before_start:
Resuspend the lyophilized QIAGEN Protease in 1.4 ml of Buffer FG3 (hydration buffer) and store at 2–8°C or in aliquots at –20°C

 

Frozen blood should be thawed in a 37°C water bath

 

For every 1 ml of blood, mix together 500 μl Buffer FG2 (denaturation buffer) and 5 μl reconstituted QIAGEN Protease
warning:
Protease mixture should be prepared not more than 1 hour before use.

All centrifugation steps should be carried out at room temperature in a swing-out rotor using conical tubes.
protocol_affiliation: Instituto Federal de Educação, Ciência e Tecnologia do Norte de Minas Gerais,Instituto René Rachou - Fiocruz Minas,Departamento de Enfermagem Materno-infantil e Saúde Pública, Escola de Enfermagem, Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais - UFMG
affiliation: Instituto Federal de Educação, Ciência e Tecnologia do Norte de Minas Gerais
authors: Eyleen Nabyla Alvarenga Niitsuma,Gabriel da Rocha Fernandes,Francisco Carlos Félix Lana

status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

components.data: Pipet 5 ml Buffer FG1 into a 10 ml centrifuge tube. Add 2 ml whole blood and mix by inverting the tube 5 times.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pipet 5 ml Buffer FG1 into a 10 ml centrifuge tube. Add 2 ml whole blood and mix by inverting the tube 5 times.

components.data: Centrifuge for 5 min at 2000 x g in a swing-out rotor.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge for 5 min at 2000 x g in a swing-out rotor.

components.data: Invert the tube 3 times, place it in a heating block or water bath, and incubate at 65°C for 10 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Invert the tube 3 times, place it in a heating block or water bath, and incubate at 65°C for 10 min.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 5 of Extraction of DNA from 2 ml blood samples using Flexigene Kit (QIAGEN)
source_data.protocol_name: Extraction of DNA from 2 ml blood samples using Flexigene Kit (QIAGEN)
source_data.protocol_name_html: Extraction of DNA from 2 ml blood samples using Flexigene Kit (QIAGEN)
source_data.annotation: The sample changes color from red to olive green, indicating protein digestion.
source_data.thread_text: The sample changes color from red to olive green, indicating protein digestion.
source_data.body: The sample changes color from red to olive green, indicating protein digestion.
source_data.affiliation: Instituto Federal de Educação, Ciência e Tecnologia do Norte de Minas Gerais

components.data: Add 1 ml Buffer FG2/QIAGEN Protease, close the tube, and vortex immediately until the pellet is completely homogenized. Inspect the tube to check that homogenization is complete.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 1 ml Buffer FG2/QIAGEN Protease, close the tube, and vortex immediately until the pellet is completely homogenized. Inspect the tube to check that homogenization is complete.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 4 of Extraction of DNA from 2 ml blood samples using Flexigene Kit (QIAGEN)
source_data.protocol_name: Extraction of DNA from 2 ml blood samples using Flexigene Kit (QIAGEN)
source_data.protocol_name_html: Extraction of DNA from 2 ml blood samples using Flexigene Kit (QIAGEN)
source_data.annotation:
When processing multiple samples, vortex each tube immediately after addition of Buffer FG2/QIAGEN Protease. Do not wait until buffer has been added to all samples before vortexing.

Usually 3–4 pulses of high-speed vortexing for 5 s each are sufficient to homogenize the pellet. However, traces of pellet with a jelly-like consistency (often barely visible) may remain. If these traces are seen, add a further 300 μl Buffer FG2 and vortex again.
source_data.thread_text:
When processing multiple samples, vortex each tube immediately after addition of Buffer FG2/QIAGEN Protease. Do not wait until buffer has been added to all samples before vortexing.

Usually 3–4 pulses of high-speed vortexing for 5 s each are sufficient to homogenize the pellet. However, traces of pellet with a jelly-like consistency (often barely visible) may remain. If these traces are seen, add a further 300 μl Buffer FG2 and vortex again.
source_data.body:
When processing multiple samples, vortex each tube immediately after addition of Buffer FG2/QIAGEN Protease. Do not wait until buffer has been added to all samples before vortexing.

Usually 3–4 pulses of high-speed vortexing for 5 s each are sufficient to homogenize the pellet. However, traces of pellet with a jelly-like consistency (often barely visible) may remain. If these traces are seen, add a further 300 μl Buffer FG2 and vortex again.
source_data.affiliation: Instituto Federal de Educação, Ciência e Tecnologia do Norte de Minas Gerais

components.data: Discard the supernatant and leave the tube inverted on a clean sheet of absorbent paper for 2 min, taking care that the pellet remains in the tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Discard the supernatant and leave the tube inverted on a clean sheet of absorbent paper for 2 min, taking care that the pellet remains in the tube.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 3 of Extraction of DNA from 2 ml blood samples using Flexigene Kit (QIAGEN)
source_data.protocol_name: Extraction of DNA from 2 ml blood samples using Flexigene Kit (QIAGEN)
source_data.protocol_name_html: Extraction of DNA from 2 ml blood samples using Flexigene Kit (QIAGEN)
source_data.annotation: In rare cases the pellet may be loose, so pour slowly. Inverting the tube onto absorbent paper minimizes backflow of supernatant from the rim and sides of the tube onto the pellet.
source_data.thread_text: In rare cases the pellet may be loose, so pour slowly. Inverting the tube onto absorbent paper minimizes backflow of supernatant from the rim and sides of the tube onto the pellet.

source_data.title: leave tube inverted on a sheet of absorbent paper

components.data: Add 1 ml isopropanol (100%) and mix thoroughly by inversion until the DNA precipitate becomes visible as threads or a clump.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 1 ml isopropanol (100%) and mix thoroughly by inversion until the DNA precipitate becomes visible as threads or a clump.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 6 of Extraction of DNA from 2 ml blood samples using Flexigene Kit (QIAGEN)
source_data.protocol_name: Extraction of DNA from 2 ml blood samples using Flexigene Kit (QIAGEN)
source_data.protocol_name_html: Extraction of DNA from 2 ml blood samples using Flexigene Kit (QIAGEN)
source_data.annotation: Complete mixing with isopropanol is vital to precipitate the DNA and must be checked by inspection. For samples with very low white blood cell 2 counts, in which the DNA may not be visible, invert the tube at least 20 times.
source_data.thread_text: Complete mixing with isopropanol is vital to precipitate the DNA and must be checked by inspection. For samples with very low white blood cell 2 counts, in which the DNA may not be visible, invert the tube at least 20 times.
source_data.body: Complete mixing with isopropanol is vital to precipitate the DNA and must be checked by inspection. For samples with very low white blood cell 2 counts, in which the DNA may not be visible, invert the tube at least 20 times.

source_data.annotation: In rare cases the pellet may be loose, so pour slowly. If the white blood cell count of the sample was sufficiently high, the DNA should be visible as a small white pellet.

components.data: Air-dry the DNA pellet until all the liquid has evaporated (at least 5 min).
components.name: Description

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 12 of Extraction of DNA from 2 ml blood samples using Flexigene Kit (QIAGEN)
source_data.protocol_name: Extraction of DNA from 2 ml blood samples using Flexigene Kit (QIAGEN)
source_data.protocol_name_html: Extraction of DNA from 2 ml blood samples using Flexigene Kit (QIAGEN)
source_data.annotation: Avoid over-drying the DNA pellet, since over-dried DNA is very difficult to dissolve.
source_data.thread_text: Avoid over-drying the DNA pellet, since over-dried DNA is very difficult to dissolve.

components.data: Add 200 μl Buffer FG3, vortex for 5 s at low speed, and dissolve the DNA by incubating for 1 h at 65°C in a heating block or water bath.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 200 μl Buffer FG3, vortex for 5 s at low speed, and dissolve the DNA by incubating for 1 h at 65°C in a heating block or water bath.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 13 of Extraction of DNA from 2 ml blood samples using Flexigene Kit (QIAGEN)
source_data.protocol_name: Extraction of DNA from 2 ml blood samples using Flexigene Kit (QIAGEN)
source_data.protocol_name_html: Extraction of DNA from 2 ml blood samples using Flexigene Kit (QIAGEN)
source_data.annotation: If the DNA is not completely dissolved, incubate the solution overnight at room temperature. If a reduced volume of Buffer FG3 is used, the incubation time may need to be prolonged.
source_data.thread_text: If the DNA is not completely dissolved, incubate the solution overnight at room temperature. If a reduced volume of Buffer FG3 is used, the incubation time may need to be prolonged.
